description: The Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM) has signed an MoU with Chainlink. Under the MoU, both entities have agreed to collaborate on regulatory discussions and educational awareness initiatives in the UAE.
title: ADGM, Chainlink Sign MoU to Explore Compliant Tokenisation Rules, Cross-Chain Interoperability

description: Apple is set to stave off a possible fine and an EU order over its browser options on iPhones. The EU decision will come amid tensions with US President Donald Trump who has threatened to slap tariffs against countries that levy fines against US companies.
title: Apple Said to Have Staved Off EU Fine After Making Changes to Its Browser Options on iPhone

description: While Ubisoft has not made initial sales figures public yet, two separate reports have claimed that Assassin’s Creed Shadows is the series’ second biggest launch ever, behind only 2020’s Assassin’s Creed Valhalla.
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Said to Be Series' Second Biggest Launch Ever

description: DeepSeek released updates to its V3 model. This update claims to address real-world challenges while setting benchmarks for accuracy and efficiency.
title: China’s DeepSeek Unveils Latest Update in Race With OpenAI

description: India has said that there would be no import duties on some goods used to manufacture electric vehicle batteries and mobile phones. India has been preparing to mitigate the impact of US President Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs set to take effect from April 2.
title: Government Ends Import Duty for Items Needed to Make EV Batteries, Phones

description: Samsung will most likely launch the Galaxy S26 Ultra around January next year, but we are already hearing several early predictions about the flagship. As per a tipster, the Galaxy S26 Ultra is undergoing early tests with a different rear camera unit and a bigger battery. The handset is expected to retain the 200-megapixel primary rear camera like the current model.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra With Three Rear Cameras, Larger Battery Reportedly Under Testing

description: India has ordered Samsung to pay $601 million (roughly Rs. 5,149 crore) in back taxes and penalties for dodging import tariffs. The Samsung investigation began in 2021 when tax inspectors searched its offices in the financial capital of Mumbai and Gurugram near New Delhi, seizing documents, emails and some electronic devices.
title: Samsung Ordered to Pay $601 Million in Back Taxes in India, Penalties Over Telecom Imports

description: The TRN Odyssey initiative will fund promising Web3 gaming projects that are built on the TRN Layer-1 blockchain. Developers can fetch investments between $10,000 (roughly Rs. 8.5 lakh) and $1 million (roughly Rs. 8 crore) through this initiative.
title: TRN Odyssey Programme Goes Live, Opens Funding Opportunities for Web3 Game Developers

description: Vivo Vision was unveiled by the company at the Boao Forum for Asia 2025 in China as a new mixed reality headset. Bearing a striking resemblance to the Apple Vision Pro that was unveiled in 2023, Vivo's device is set to debut as a prototype mid-2025. Here's everything you need to know about the upcoming Vivo Vision headset.
title: Vivo Vision Mixed Reality Headset Unveiled China; Bears Striking Resemblance to Apple Vision Pro

description: Vivo X Fold 4 is expected to arrive soon as a successor to the Vivo X Fold 3, which was unveiled in China in March 2024 alongside a Pro variant. However, the upcoming foldable is said to break cover considerably later this year according to a tipster who has suggested the expected launch timeline of the handset. Meanwhile, another tipster has hinted at the key features of the rumoured book-style Vivo X Fold 4 including its chipset, battery, charging and camera details.
title: Vivo X Fold 4 May Launch in Q3 2025; Key Features Surface Online Again

description: Netflix now supports HDR10+ streaming, delivering dynamic and accurate picture quality with better contrast, vibrant colours, and greater detail for eligible subscribers. The platform plans to expand its HDR10+ content catalogue. Additionally, Netflix utilizes the AV1 media codec for efficient bandwidth usage on compatible devices, enhancing the overall streaming experience.
title: Netflix Now Supports Streaming HDR10+ Content on AV1-Enabled TVs, Streaming Devices

description: Optoma UHC70LV 4K UHD projector has been launched in India. It is claimed to be the world's first Dolby Vision-certified high-brightness home cinema projector. Alongside Dolby Vision technology, it comes with support for HDR10+, 5,000 lumens of brightness, and up to 4K UHD resolution. It can project images of up to 300-inch with dual-light laser technology.
title: Optoma UHC70LV 4K UHD Projector With 5,000 Lumen Brightness, Dolby Vision Support Launched in India

description: Swiggy Instamart has announced a fast delivery service for smartphones in India. The quick delivery platform will sell smartphones from brands like Apple, Samsung, OnePlus, and Redmi to customers in select locations. The service will likely be rolled out to more areas eventually. Customers can order the latest iPhone 16e on the instant delivery platform for quick delivery. Swiggy claims that the smartphones will be delivered under 10 minutes of receiving the order.
title: Swiggy Instamart Launches 10-Minute Smartphone Delivery Service in Select Indian Cities

description: Boat Storm Infinity smartwatch was launched in India on Tuesday. It is claimed to offer a battery life of up to 15 days with heavy usage. It supports fast charging, Bluetooth calling, and several health monitoring features like heart rate, blood oxygen level, sleep and stress trackers. The watch has an IP68 rating for dust and water resistance and is equipped with a functional crown.
title: Boat Storm Infinity Smartwatch With Bluetooth Calling, Up to 15 Days Battery Life Launched in India

description: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle will release on PlayStation 5 on April 17, Bethesda announced on Monday in an elaborate promotional video featuring actors Troy Baker and Nolan North. The video brings two adventurers together in Baker, who plays Indy in the action-adventure game, and North, who helmed the iconic role of Nathan Drake in Uncharted games on PlayStation.
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle Launches on PS5 on April 17, Pre-Orders Now Live

description: iQOO Z10 will be announced in India next month as a follow-up to last year's iQOO Z9. The Vivo sub-brand has been teasing the upcoming Z series phone vigorously on its social media handles, and a recent post showcases the two colourways of the device. The iQOO Z10 is confirmed to ship with a 7.89mm thick profile and a 7,300mAh battery. It is expected to run on a Snapdragon chipset.
title: iQOO Z10 Colour Options, Design Teased Ahead of April 11 India Launch

description: Lava Shark was launched in India on Tuesday. The smartphone is an entry-level offering with an AI-backed 50-megapixel main rear camera sensor. It is powered by a Unisoc T606 chipset paired with up to 8GB of dynamic RAM. The handset runs on Android 14 out-of-the-box and is backed by a 5,000mAh battery. It is equipped with AI imaging features and supports face unlock and a side-mounted fingerprint sensor.
title: Lava Shark With 50-Megapixel Rear Camera, 5,000mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: OnePlus unveiled the OnePlus 13 with Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC at the beginning of the year in India. Now, the Chinese smartphone company appears to be gearing up to unveil the OnePlus 13T with a compact form factor. OnePlus is yet to confirm its existence, but a new leak from China hints at the display and battery details of the phone. It is said to go official sometime in April. The phone is speculated to get a bigger battery than the OnePlus 13.
title: OnePlus 13T Tipped to Launch in April; Could Pack Larger Battery Than OnePlus 13

description: Earlier this month, Rosmerta Digital Services Ltd had sought to initiate insolvency proceedings against Ola Electric Technologies Pvt Ltd. On Tuesday, March 25 Ola said it has amicably settled all dues with its former vehicle registration service provider.
title: Ola Electric Arm Settles Dues with Vehicle Registration Service Provider

description: OpenAI COO Brad Lightcap will take on greater responsibility for the day-to-day operations of the business, This will include overseeing international expansion and corporate partnerships with firms such as Microsoft and Apple. Mark Chen and Julia Villagra have also been promoted to chief research officer and chief people officer, respectively.
title: OpenAI Expands COO’s Role as Sam Altman Focuses on Research and Products

description: OpenAI’s Sam Altman is reportedly in talks with Visa to develop a comprehensive wallet strategy, enhancing cross-platform transactions with crypto, cards, and fiat currencies. An official confirmation from Altman or Visa is still awaited.
title: Sam Altman and Visa in Talks to Power World Wallet with Crypto, Card, and Cash Features: Report

description: Vivo will unveil the Y300 Pro+ smartphone in China next week. Ouyang Weifeng, Vice president of Vivo products, announced the launch date of the new Vivo Y300 series phone through the Chinese social media platform. The executive has shared a poster revealing the Vivo Y300 Pro+'s design and confirming its key specifications. Meanwhile, the Vivo Y300 Pro+ was spotted on a benchmarking website alongside a Vivo Y300 GT suggesting key specifications.
title: Vivo Y300 Pro+ With 7,300mAh Battery Confirmed to Launch Next Week, Vivo Y300 GT Surfaces on Geekbench

description: iOS 18.4 release candidate is rolling out to beta testers, ahead of the stable release. The iOS 18.4 update introduces seven new emoji, Priority Notifications, CarPlay enhancements, Visual Intelligence shortcuts, and expanded Apple Intelligence support in more languages and regions, including the EU. Users can also set default apps in additional categories on iOS 18.4.
title: iOS 18.4 RC Rolls Out to Beta Testers as Apple Prepares for Stable Release

description: Motorola Edge 60 series is set to launch in India on April 2. Ahead of the launch, several details of the series had surfaced online. The company has also shared official teasers for the Edge 60 variant that show the upcoming handset in three colour options. Now, new set of leaked design renders of the Edge 60 Fusion showcase the phone in four colourways.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion Design Renders Surface Online Again Ahead of April 2 India Launch

description: Warner Bros. was reportedly working on a Mario Kart-like racing title that would bring together characters from the company’s wide portfolio of IPs, including Adventure Time, Scooby Doo, Tom Jerry and more. The kart racer was in the works at Warner Bros. Games San Diego, which was shut down alongside two other in-house studios in February.
title: Warner Bros. San Diego Was Reportedly Working on Mario Kart-Like Racer Before Being Shut

description: Apple's AirPods Max will soon support lossless audio playback, enabled by iOS 18.4. This update applies to the refreshed version featuring a USB Type-C port. Apple also promises low-latency performance via USB cable, comparable to its built-in speakers. These enhancements elevate the audio experience of Apple's most premium wireless headphones.
title: Apple's AirPods Max to Gain Lossless Audio, Low-Latency Audio Support With iOS 18.4 Update
OPPO F29 Series: "Made for India" and “Tested in India” to Perform in the Most Demanding Conditions

description: Realme 14T had previously surfaced on certification websites, while leaks have suggested its expected color options, RAM, and storage variants. Now, the purported handset has appeared in online retail listings, offering a glimpse of its design and key specifications. Additionally, a tipster has shared potential features of the device, some of which differ from the details in the retail listing.
title: Realme 14T Design Renders Leaked; Key Features Surface Online Via Retail Listing
